reviews.review: If you like Challenging Puzzles, Interesting Story, and Witty Comedic Dialogue, This game is for You. I've loved this game forever and I fully recommend it. Nuff Said.
Зашёл в игру, пришлось собирать мозги по осколкам.
Has like 0 replay value but [b]very[/b] fun on the first playthrough and you need to play it if you are gonna play portal 2
It has a unique atmosphere to it.
Very fun and cool game would recommend, and if you can buy the portal 1 and 2 bundle
Прикольная игра с интересной механикой. Имеется небольшой сюжет.
Un clasico que no habia jugado nunca y me mantuvo atado a la silla por horas. Excelente!
Infinitely replayable. Lot's of creative usage of portals. Fun puzzle design. Funny dialogue. Great start to the Portal series.
also really fun game.  And if you get this make sure to get portal 2 because they are both really good.
very fun for only 2 hours worth of gameplay
Game made my blood levels rise by 3 points which at my current amount may cause me to have a slight stroke.
Hola, tengo una duda que me gustaría resolver. Como puedo reembolsar este juego teniendo mas de 2 horas así lo compro 100 veces mas?
流程很短，但绝对有意思
Good fun. good puzzles, good experience.

thats like hte part in the second spongebob movie sponge out of water when the krabby patty secret formula dissapears while plankton and spob are both tring to take it from eachother but then  everyone kills planton and then spoy needs to maake krab pab but there are non left and ussually they would just make jmore but they dont have the secret forlume so they both scream
i am GLAD this game was good

포탈1은 적당한 난이도와 적당한 플레이타임으로 솔직히 게임 그 자체만 봐도 상타치는 그냥 먹고 간다고 본다.
2012년도쯤에 나온 게임이라 옛날게임이라고 편견을 가질 수 있지만 2021년도에 플레이 한 내가봐도 
이 게임은 지금 나온 게임이라고 말해도 무방할 게임이다. 포탈1은 퍼즐풀기에 포커스가 맞춰져있다면 포탈2는 
포탈1을 기반으로 더욱더 광범위한 스토리를 선사해준다. 포탈1만 플레이했다면 포탈2도 꼭 플레이 해봐야 한다고 생각한다.
결론 : 포탈 갓갓겜
Super bueno muy recomendable una historia bastante buena encima hay niveles de bonificacion
Игра прикольная,особенно для фанов головолоиок и т.д.

Poesia per il mondo del Gaymer.
Il miglior gioco del mondo mai crato
Fun game, like the physics, but the cake is a lie.

轻快的音乐，巧妙的解谜设计，搞怪的对话，相爱相杀的主角和boss......
小而精的神作！
good game recoment to play it it worth
This game is a classic. Short play time with an interesting story. It get tricky at times but that's what makes it fun! :)
Еще один золотой представитель игр от Valve, спасибо за тортик
先玩的alyx再玩的portal，原来valve一直都是一个风格，惊悚物理解密类游戏有一手的

Probably one of the most iconic games ever. Great dialogue from the antagonist and smooth game play for the time. Lots of different cool physics in the game and it's great to get your mind going if you've never played it before.
portal geçişleri çok akıcı ama eğer midenizin kolay bulanıorsa birazcık zorluk çekebilirsiniz
I'm not sure what to put here other than it's a fun game with a neat gun. (And It's probably my favorite game ever)
not as good as 2, but is still worth the buck
Es entretenido para joder un rato, en 11 horas me lo pase con todos los logros.
Дуже цікава гра , тільки мало рівнів. Кінець просто топ.
Played Portal 2 on Xbox 360 so i've always wanted to get the first Portal. Love the game <3
love this game so much i finished it in two sessions and i love how many small details there are
Bought it for the nostalgia. Love it to this day. (Second time to purchase it though x.X)
Старая, но все еще прикольная игра. Прошел много раз, а дальше уже занимался фигней, искал фишки и пытался спидранить
Muito bom tem quebra cabeças Interessantes recomendo.
This is a good game, but it makes me motion sick :(
Nice puzzles with amazing worldbuilding, deserves to be a classic in my eyes. A shame it doesnt have that many puzzles as I would like to see more but it is a solid 9/10.

Dude, it's Portal. You already know it's great from the reviews and references. What you may not know is that it and its sequel sell for only 2 dollars each during the "Steam Summer Sales" which kind of makes them a steal in my opinion.
Excellent game and storytelling. Kept me on my toes :)

Probably one of the most iconic games ever. Great dialogue from the antagonist and smooth game play for the time. Lots of different cool physics in the game and it's great to get your mind going if you've never played it before.
love the game, one of my all time favs
